amendment.description: To increase by $2,000,000 the amount authorized to be appropriated for research, development, test, and evaluation, Defense-wide activities, and make the increase available for neurotoxin mitigation research, and to provide an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3241 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3241 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Nelson NE. (consideration: CR S6056; text: CR S6056) To increase by $2,000,000 the amount authorized to be appropriated for research, development, test, and evaluation, Defense-wide activities, and make the increase available for neurotoxin mitigation research, and to provide an offset.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3241 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3241 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Nelson NE.
